channel.title: "No Connection From Server, Please Use Other World"
channel.description: Ok, so when people try to connect to my server this is what happens.. "No Connection From Server, Please Use Other World" I made my no-ip and utorrent i made server = (my no-ip) made an archive and changed it back to 127.0.0.1 Idk what to do... Please Help Me :) (Also here is my client link if you want to see for yourself) ***http://www.mediafire.com/?a8fmliix09y9591***

item.title: "No Connection From Server, Please Use Other World"
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:428801”][quote author=nicke924 link=topic=483032.msg3537539#msg3537539 date=1300645355]
Give your client to your friends and they try. I always log on localhost/127.0.0.1 and they use my no-ip
[/quote][/quote]I did that and it says the same thing

Read full topic

item.title: "No Connection From Server, Please Use Other World"
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

Ok, so when people try to connect to my server this is what happens…
“No Connection From Server, Please Use Other World”
I made my no-ip and utorrent
i made server = (my no-ip)
made an archive and changed it back to 127.0.0.1
Idk what to do…
Please Help Me
(Also here is my client link if you want to see for yourself)
http://www.mediafire.com/?a8fmliix09y9591

Read full topic
